name: skyhire-backend-dev
description: Aggregator to run all SkyHire backend services with one command

scripts.install:all: npm i --prefix api-gateway && npm i --prefix auth-service && npm i --prefix user-service && npm i --prefix cv-service && npm i --prefix interview-service && npm i --prefix job-service && npm i --prefix chat-service && npm i --prefix notifications-service
scripts.start:all: concurrently -k -n gateway,auth,user,cv,interview,jobs,chat,notifications -c magenta,blue,green,cyan,yellow,white,red,gray "npm --prefix api-gateway start" "npm --prefix auth-service start" "npm --prefix user-service start" "npm --prefix cv-service start" "npm --prefix interview-service start" "npm --prefix job-service start" "npm --prefix chat-service start" "npm --prefix notifications-service start"
